acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should not create instances of an interface when given an external factory which does not manufacture the concrete type
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldNotBeAbleToCreateInterfaceInstancesGivenAnExternalFactoryWhichDoesNotManufactureTheConcreteType

test-step.description: Given a Podam Factory with external factory
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.InterfacePojo
Then the object should be null
Then the two objects 1 and 1 should be equal
Then the two objects interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.InterfacePojo and interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.InterfacePojo should be equal
Then the two objects 0 and 0 should be equal
